This Schedule below contains a plot of land measuring 106.50 sq. m. on 19.08.2021. On the date, my husband Teetla Yesupadam alias Yesugangadhara Rao garu registered and registered in the Eluru R.O. Book 1, Document No. 8473/2021, and the property on which R.C.C. Dhaba was built and which I have been enjoying with full possession and rights till today, has come into my possession as per the deed. You are my second son. Out of the love and affection I have for you, I have chosen this love as a reward and have given you the property as per the schedule below free of charge, and have registered this deed in your name and have taken possession of the schedule property today itself. Therefore, from now on, you shall be the owner of the said property in my place, and you shall enjoy it freely, with your hereditary rights of donation, exchange, and sale, including water, treasure, deposits, and stones. Neither you nor your heirs, nor I nor my heirs, shall ever have any disputes regarding this property. Whatever may happen to anyone due to such intellectual and feudal obstacles, I, my heirs, etc., shall be able to avoid all such problems at my own expense and shall be able to operate this property for you without interruption. From now on, you shall pay all the taxes payable annually to the Panchayat for this property. The Panchayat has hereby filed the transfer for registering your name in their accounts. That this property has not been acquired by any other person by way of purchase, donation, mortgage, guarantee, lease, equitable mortgage or any other alienation, that there is no other rightful owner of this property except me, that this property is an undisputed and undisputed property, that this property is not an encroached upon property by the Government, and that this deed is written in your name and given to you. The deed bearing Eluru R.O. No. 8473/2021 in my name and a copy of the previous record in relation to this property are hereby given to you as vouchers. This is my consent. Schedule Property Details

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No.6435 of 2024, dated 07/Nov/2024, executed by Theetla Lilly Grace in favour of his Son, Theetla Ashok, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 106.5 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 11-84, Assessment No: 1584, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Gram Panchayat & Village, Pedapadu Mandal within the District of West Godavari registered at sub-registrar office Vatlur is bounded as follows: North by: Site of Theetla Balaswamy ( 33.6 Feet ) South by: Main Road ( 31.6 Feet) East by: Site of Theetla Chandra Leela ( 28.0 Feet ) West by: Site of Theetla Paskali ( 31.0 Feet )

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property bearing house number 11- 84, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Village, measuring about 106.5 Sq.Yds., was originally owned by Theetla Anthony. 2. Thereupon, the said Theetla Anthony died intestate on 12/Aug/1986, as evidenced by the Non-Availability of Death Certificate issued by the Government of Andhra Pradesh- Vatluru Gram Panchayat, Health and Medical Department vide Registration No.41621-ND-10, dated .07/Aug/2018, leaving behind 1.Teetla Chandra Leela ( Wife) &, 2. Teetlya Yesu Padam ( Son) as his family members. Note:However, the Family Member Certificate/Legal Heir Certificate of Theetla Anthony was not made available for our perusal, as such, we are unable to determine whether there are any other legal heirs apart from those who were derived from the deed. Whereas, in accordance with the Limitation Act and due to the efflux of time, any risk of a potential claim stands mitigated, as such the Legal Heir Certificate of Theetla Anthony was not insisted upon. 3. The aforementioned, Teetla Chandra Leela executed a Gift Settlement Deed on. 17/Nov/2005, registered as document No.12568 of 2005, before the SRO Eluru in favour of her Son, Teetlya Yesu Padam, towards the property measuring 106.5 Sq.Yds., bearing house number : 7-811, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Village. 4.The aforementioned, Theetla Yesu Gangadhara Rao executed a Gift Settlement Deed on. 23/Aug/2021, registered as document No.8473 of 2021, before the SRO Eluru, in favour of his wife, Theetla Lilly Grace, towards the property measuring 106.5 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 11- 84, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Village. 5.The aforementioned Theetla Lilly Grace executed a Mortgage Deed on 16/Oct/2021 registered as document No. 2653 of 2021 before the SRO Vatlur in favour of Home First Finance Company India LTD. Branch at Mumbai towards the property measuring 106.5 Sq.Yds., situated in Vatluru Village, which was subsequently discharged vide Receipt Deed dated 18/Nov/2023, registered as document no.4679 of 2023. [Ref: EC] 6. The aforementioned, Theetla Lilly Grace executed a Gift Settlement Deed on. 07/Nov/2024, registered as document No.6435 of 2024, before the SRO Vatlur, in favour of his Son, Theetla Ashok, towards the property measuring 106.5 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 11- 84, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Village. 7.The aforementioned Theetla Ashok, executed a Mortgage Deed on 15/Feb/2025, registered as document No. 721 of 2025, before the SRO Vatlur in favour of Home First Finance Company India Limited, Eluru Branch, towards the property measuring 106.5 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 11- 84, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Village. [Ref: EC] Note: It is to be noted that there is an active mortgage vide Doc.No. 721 of 2025 with Home First Finance Company India Limited, Eluru Branch, whereas, it is informed by F.I. that this is a 'BT Case', hence, F.I. is to obtain a Receipt Deed before the disbursement of the loan. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1.The Property Tax Receipt, dated 13/Jan/2026, imprinted by the Vatluru Gram Panchayat discloses that Theetla Ashok has paid property tax from period 2025 to 2026 towards house number 11- 84 and Old Assessment No: 1584 & Assessment No:214861002835. 2.Encumbrance Certificate vide Statement No.139931949, dated 30/Jan/2026 extracted for the period, with respect to the Schedule Property have been provided. We confirm that the said certificate does not reflect any adverse entries. Note:It has been noted that the Dual Name Affidavit was not attached in this case. When the same is enquired with F.I. they reverted to release a conditional report. It is advisable to F.I. obtain Dual Name Affidavit prior to the loan disbursement of the loan.

sections.content: Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.

We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Theetla Ashok, possesses a clear & valid title to the property measuring 106.5 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 11-84, Assessment No: 1584, comprised in survey number.436, situated in Vatluru Gram Panchayat & Village, Pedapadu Mandal within the District of West Godavari registered at sub-registrar office Vatlur, Subject to discharge active mortgage vide.doc.no.721 of 2025.
